Settings
MainActivity
Dataset Wizard

Welcome to the Daily Life Tracker Dataset Wizard. A Dataset is a collection of data, which includes to do list items, your positive life goals and various other useful things to help you strive towards a more positive life

You need at least one Dataset to use the Daily Life Tracker but you can have many of them . Please note, however, that some personal information, such as your weight or other body measurements are stored independently of Datasets.

Here you can choose from one of our existing templates (more specialist templates will be available soon), or you can create your own. existing templates come with a preset collection of life categories and positive weekly habits to help guide you in using the DLT. If you are new to DLT perhaps you should choose the "Advanced or Basic" template to get started. you can come back. anytime to create furthur Datasets when you are feeling more confident

Each Dataset can be "Themed", a theme allows you to specify your own target levels for meeting your weekly habit goals. It is also possible to set the colours used to indicate the success level in the action input area. We have create some themes for you to choose from using popular colours. Choose one of the preset themes to save yourself some time.

An important aid to analyzing and improving your life is to divide up the various aspects of your life into rough groups which you can then focus on. Here in the Daily Life Tracker we call these life aspect groups "Categories". You can create as many or as few (well at least one) as you like. However, 3 to about 6 or 8 generally fits well. Don\'t worry if you are not sure what to call them, you can change the names later.

Categories are a way of breaking down your weekly routines into either types of activity or the element of your life you wish to improve. For example you might have a categories called "Financial Mastery", "Exam Preparation", or "Gardening". We have provided space for up to six categories but you can have as many or as few as you like. You can also add sub-categories later on. During the next stages you will add the individual actions (elements of your weekly routine).
Congratulations, you have successfully completed the Dataset wizard.

Please note that, unless this is your first Dataset, your new data set will not be active in the DLT until you change your chosen data set in setting page. We hope that, with the help of Daily Life Tracker, you can begin to build up weekly positive habits that will steadily improve your life.
Thank you for creating a new Dataset. you can switch to it at any time from within the setting page. Click the finish button below to return to your DLT Homepage.
CustomTempleteActivity
Now you have created some categories it time for you to have a think about which aspects of your life are the most important to you.

With each one of your new categories (life area) you will see a "Relative Importance" slider. You can adjust these sliders to a level that you think best describes how important the categories are in relation to one another. In itself, this is often a very useful exercise when starting to look for ways to improve your life.
Now that you have set up your categories it is time to add in some weekly goals (positive habits). These weekly goals, or habits, we call Actions.

Click the Edit button next to a category to add/edit the actions within. An action could simply be to walk for 10 minutes every day, or to dine out once a week. If you don\'t want to do this now, just click the next button. You can add actions later.
